snippet.title: Lost in Blindness - TEASER
snippet.description:
Have you ever wondered if you could play a video game, without even looking at the screen? 👁
What if you played this unique sound-based adventure game, without even seeing anything! 🎧

Lost in Blindness is available on Steam 🎮 : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564150/Lost_in_Blindness
